title: AyiyE AyiyE O lAlAjI
sahitya:
AyiyE AyiyE O lAlAjI lAlAjI zar zamInpar avatariyE ham hirtOn mE udAriyE


anupallavi

  rAjyOg mE rAj hOtE prAN AhUti dEnEkEliyE


caraNam 1   ApkI yAd mE ham dil lagtE ghamE firAhmEn AsU bahAtE
andhErE dil ujAl jAtE anant kI aur lEjAtE
    caraNam 2    tan bhI tErA man bhI tErA tErA sAnj savErA
jIvan ghErA kartE basErA dhanya hOjAyE vasundharA
